Player History
Had first career hit (double) on 3/31/2013, off Andrew Cashner (SD)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/2013, off J.P. Howell (LAD)...
Was selected to the 2013 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/28/2013 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for one week...
1/30/2015: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,321,429 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 5/24/2015 with a Fractured Jaw, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 8/24/2015 with a Torn Thigh Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
1/30/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,321,429 through salary arbitration...
1/30/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,321,429 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/16/2018 to a 3-year deal worth $12,000,000 per year...
Injured on 6/2/2018 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Houston to San Diego on 3/2/2020 (Going to SD: 3B Josh Donaldson, P John Benedetti, 2B Todd Frazier. Going to HOU: C Yasmani Grandal)...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 3/2/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $712,000 per year...
Injured on 7/20/2021 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 5 days...
Drafted in 5th round, 124th overall pick, by Oakland in 2023...
